entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING IN EFFECT, Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 3:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 16.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 12.7°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of rain beginning late this evening and ending overnight. Fog patches this evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
